level.text: Contributions in support of an exploratory committee shall be received or made in accordance with ยง 3009 of Chapter 30 of this title, except that individual and aggregate contributions shall be limited for the following exploratory committees to the amounts specified:
Chairman of the Council – $1,500 individual, and $150,000 aggregate;
At-large member of the Council – $1,000 individual, and $100,000 aggregate;
Ward Councilmember or President of the State Board of Education – $500 individual, and $50,000 aggregate; and
Member of the State Board of Education – $200 individual, and $20,000 aggregate.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 1402 (February 8, 2013); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 11864 (August 16, 2013).
